data.question: What is the journal title where the research on Pyridinium 1,1'-Binaphthyl-2,2'-disulfonates was published?
data.answer: Journal of the American Chemical Society

data.question: Who is the corresponding author for the study on chiral Brønsted Acid−Base Combined Salt Catalysts for Enantioselective Mannich-Type Reaction?
What is the DOI of the article discussing Pyridinium 1,1'-Binaphthyl-2,2'-disulfonates as catalysts?
In the synthesis of BINSA from BINOL, what technique improved the thermolysis in the Newman−Kwart rearrangement?
What was the yield percentage of the unprecedented oxidation of compound 3 to produce compound 1'?
Is the compound 1,1'-binaphthyl-2,2'-disulfonic acid (BINSA) a chiral Brønsted acid catalyst?
Was the direct Mannich-type reaction of 7a with 6a improved by slow addition of 7a?
Did the use of 2,6-diphenylpyridine (2a) as a Brønsted base result in high enantioselectivity for the Mannich-type reaction?
What was the effect of the molar ratio of 2a to 1 on the enantioselectivities of 8a?
data.answer: Enantioselectivities were dramatically improved with a more than 1:0.75 ratio of 1:2a

data.question: Was the absolute stereochemistry of the Mannich products determined using Terada's procedure?
What was the yield of the Mannich-type reaction using 1 mol % of 1·2a2 in the presence of MgSO4?
Did the Mannich-type reaction with cyclic 1,3-diketone result in a product with high enantioselectivity?
What was the diastereomer ratio for the Mannich-type reaction between 6a and 1,3-ketoamide (10)?
data.answer: The diastereomer ratio is not explicitly mentioned in the provided text.

data.question: Was the catalyst 1·2a2 effective for the Mannich-type reaction with a ketoester equivalent?
What was the enantioselectivity of the Mannich-type reaction using 1·2a2 for N-Boc-phenylaldimine (6b) and acetylacetone (7a)?
Did the synthesis of BINSA from BINOL involve an oxidation step?
What was the role of 2,6-diarylpyridine in the synthesis discussed?
data.answer: It acted as a Brønsted base in the enantioselective Mannich-type reactions.

data.question: Was the Mannich-type reaction optimized for the use of N-Cbz-phenylaldimine?
What was the yield of the Mannich-type reaction using 1·2a2 for N-Cbz-phenylaldimine (6a) and acetylacetone (7a)?
Did the study report a practical synthesis of chiral 1,1'-binaphthyl-2,2'-disulfonic acid (BINSA) from inexpensive BINOL?
